name: PIZZA SNAKES
description:
Get ready to slither your way to victory in this fast-paced, 3D snake game. 

PIZZA SNAKES! 

Play as single player or against other players online, as you compete to become the longest snake in the galaxy. 

--------------------------------------------------------------------------

FEATURES:

- EAT PIZZA and STARS to GROW longer! 

- Use intuitive controls, including a BOOST and BRAKE, to avoid obstacles (and other players) as you fly through the game’s 3D environment!

- 5 MIN Matches

-  Who can eat the most pizza?! The player with the HIGHEST SCORE wins.

- Available for WINDOWS and MAC

--------------------------------------------------------------------------

CONTROLS:

KEYBOARD / CONTROLLER

use WASD / Left Joystick to steer your serpent

Left Mouse Button / A Button to use the BOOST. This will increase your speed but also your turning radius.

Right mouse button /  B button allow you to BRAKE. This slows you down and dramatically  reduces your Turing radius, allowing you to make whip fast U-turns.

Mouse Movement / Left and Right Triggers controls the roll of your serpent. Mastering the rolling-brake-turn can truly unlock some high scores. 

-----------------------------------------------------------------------

We are aiming to create silly fun games that will entertain for hours on end, and would love to know what you would like to see in the game.

Please join our Discord to give the devs direct feedback, and share your experience!

Download and start playing now!

--------------------------------------------------------------------------

*** DISCLAIMER *** This is an prototype build to provide players and developers a way to test the current state of the game.  The multiplayer functionality has a number of known bugs. The multiplayer region is locked to US West for the time being. We are actively developing solutions to these bugs, and would love your input! Please join our Discord to participate with our community, or comment below with your feedback, questions, comments and concerns.
